summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Saturday, August 3, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses (including sick leave, annual leave, AWOL), and overtime occurrences for the facility. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of prison staffing and operations on a date shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Noel T
persons.context: Listed as a staff member assigned to posts including SHU (Special Housing Unit) #1 and SHU #2 on the roster.

events.title: MCC Daily Staffing Roster
events.description: Assignment roster showing staff posts, shifts, and leave statuses for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 3, 2019.
It details posts including the Special Housing Unit (SHU), attorney conference rooms, control rooms, and visitation, which are critical areas for inmate management and monitoring.
The roster shows various staff leave statuses, including Sick Leave, Annual Leave, AWOL, and Military Leave, indicating staffing challenges or absences.
The document records numerous shift changes and overtime occurrences, suggesting a dynamic and potentially understaffed operational environment.
This roster provides a baseline of prison operations one week before Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his MCC cell on August 10, 2019.
